name: FedZed Frenzy
description:
This is my submission to the 132nd Trijam! In the jam, you are tasked with making a game in 3 hours, excluding time for planning/submitting. Because the theme was "Package Delivered", I made a game where you have to deliver packages against the clock!

Your boss has given you 2 minutes of overtime to deliver as many packages as possible! The more packages you send correctly, the greater salary you earn.

Controls:

Click and Drag BoxAimQ/EChange box typeSpaceMove to next building Links:

My Twitter
